page.title: 10FLAMSTEADBURY FARM
page.content: In our block we have over 15 farms to choose from.We chose{Flamsteadbury {Farm}because it is a typical farm in our area.It is to the west of the village near the M1 motorway.The grid reference of the square that it is in is (509,212). The farm is owned by Mr.Blair and he has owned it for 33 years.The farm is arable but it has a few animals.The animals that he has are 30 beef cattle.The amount of land that the farmer owns is 700 acres and he employs 3 people.The crops that he grows are spring barley,winter barley and winter wheat. {Flamsteadbury Farm}has got the most buildings out of all the farms in { {Redbourn}.They have got 10 barns in which they store corn,hay and straw and they also keep their machinery in some of the barns.
